General.Name: Shenzhen Properties & Resources Development Group Ltd
General.Description: ShenZhen Properties & Resources Development (Group) Ltd. engages in real estate development business in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It is involved in the development, sale, and leasing of real estate properties; management and construction of buildings; rental of houses; and retail of the Chinese food, Western-style food, wines, etc. It also provides buildings and building devices maintenance, garden afforest and cleaning, engineering supervision and management, property management, construction supervision, domestic trading, marketing, catering, project supervision, and other services. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Properties & Resources Development (Group) Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Investment Holdings Co., Ltd.
